data.title: die Booking Plattform
data.meta_description: Book JAERV on gigmit for your event or party now. Free of commission and secure. Click here for more information.
data.text:
Together Joel Hagen (flute, whistles, soprano saxophone, vocals), Anders Bergsten (double bass, nyckelharpa, vocals), Harald Nilsson (guitars, vocals), Markus Gustavsson (fiddle, lead vocals) and Tobias Hedlund (percussion) have created a homogeneous, vivid sound which has established Jaerv on the traditional music scene. Rooted in several different musical traditions, Jaerv has made a global name for itself, touring in the U.S., Japan, Spain, Scotland, Ireland, Finland, Norway and more. Equally recognized by their traditional music peers as from popular music press like Billboard.

“Jaerv takes the elements of traditional Scandinavian music and reflects them through a modern prism, with an all-acoustic sound that nonetheless takes a bevy of tricky turns in rhythm and harmony that makes the pleasant rural melodies ring with a contemporary complexity” (Pop Matters).

"They are singing, playing, storytelling and are so terribly good. The audience is knocked out by their performance!" (Susanne Rydén - President of the Royal Academy of Music)

"One of Sweden's most inventive folk bands." (Nordstjernan US-magazine)

Highlighted concerts

USA - Cedar Cultural Center (Minneapolis), Old Town School of Folk Music (Chicago), House of Sweden (Washington DC), Blackstone River Theatre (Cumberland) University of Michigan (Ann Arbor)

JAPAN - Kobe Port Oasis (Kobe), Club Mandala (Tokyo), Funabashi Park (Tokyo), Kenchoji Temple (Kamakura)

EUROPE - Kaustinen Folk Music Festival (Finland), Celtic Connections (Scotland) Stockholm Folk Festival (Sweden), Hilmarfestivalen (Norway), Nordlek Dance Festival (Denmark), Noia Conservatory (Spain) Columbi Egg (Norway)
